overview: Tim brings a unique blend of 16 years of marketing and finance experience with a focus on the technology field for the last 12 years. He most recently joined from Microsoft where as a Group Product Manager he led the marketing launch to partners of Windows Vista. Prior to Microsoft he was the Vice President of Marketing at a Silicon Valley start-up, Mainstreet Networks, where he drove the product management, business development, and customer support teams. At Intel Corporation he drove operational finance and business analysis, most recently in Intel Architecture Labs assessing new technologies and business opportunities. Tim is a Beta Gamma Sigma graduate of the University of Washington MBA program with a marketing and finance emphasis and holds a bachelor of science degree with a major in accounting from Santa Clara University. Tim and his wife Jane have three daughters.
